column2: image=[[File:The J.R.R Tolkien Calendar 1974 (George Allen and Unwin).jpg
format=Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 12<sup>3</sup>⁄<sub>8</sub> inches)

column1: '''''The J.R.R Tolkien Calendar 1974''''' was the first official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin
column2: George Allen & Unwin]] in August [[1973]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Pauline Baynes]]. The cover photographer was Billett Potter.

column1: Tolkien passed away on [[2 September]] [[1973]]. However a copy of this 1974 Calendar was signed by Tolkien before his death, presumably in August 1973, making it one of the last items he signed.<ref>{{webcite
column6: website=[http://www.tolkiencalendars.com/index.html The Compleat Gyde to Tolkien Calendars]
